verses.text: Axo winhaj Festo chi', ix k'och winh t'a Cesarea, yic tz'och winh yajalil. Yoxil k'ual schaan yopisio winh chi', ix k'e winh t'a Jerusalén.
Axo heb' winh sat sacerdote yet' juntzanhxo heb' ay yopisio, ix k'och heb' t'a winh yic sk'anoch heb' t'a yib'anh winhaj Pablo chi'.
Ix och ijan heb' sk'anan t'a winhaj Festo chi', yic wach' tz'ik'jicot winhaj Pablo chi' t'a Jerusalén chi'. Ix yal heb' icha chi' yujto snib'ej heb' smilcham winh t'a yoltac b'e.
Palta ix yalan winh t'a heb': --Preso yaj winhaj Pablo chi' t'a Cesarea ticnaik. Yicto jaye' k'ual tik ol in b'atxoc ta'.
Yuj chi' syal sb'at heb' eyajalil t'a Cesarea chi' wed'oc. Tato ay smul winhaj Pablo chi', syal b'at yalan heb' ta', xchi winh t'a heb'.

Ix am ek' wajxaqueoc, ma lajunheoc k'ual winhaj Festo t'a Jerusalén chi'. Ixlajwi chi' ix paxxi winh t'a Cesarea chi'. Axo t'a junxo k'u ix em k'ojan winh t'a sk'ojnub' b'aj sb'o yaj owal. Ixlajwi chi' ix yak'an ik'joccot winhaj Pablo chi' winh.

Ayic ix k'och winh t'a yichanh winh, a heb' israel ix cot t'a Jerusalén ix k'och oyan heb' t'a stz'ey winh. Tzijtum tas ix yak'och heb' t'a yib'anh winh, palta malaj jab'oc tas sch'oxani tato yel syal heb'.

Ix yalanpax winhaj Pablo chi' t'a heb' icha tik: --Toxon malaj jab'oc in mul ochnac t'a sley heb' wetisraelal. Malaj in mul ochnac t'a stemplo Dios. Malaj pax in mul ochnac t'a winh kajal t'a Roma, xchi winh.

Palta yujto snib'ej winhaj Festo chi' to wach' skan winh t'a heb' israel, yuj chi' ix sk'anb'ej winh t'a winhaj Pablo chi': --¿Tzam yal a k'ol tzach b'at t'a Jerusalén yic wach' ata' ol ach in ch'olb'itej? xchi winh.
Axo ix yalan winhaj Pablo chi' t'a winh: --Ha t'a yichanh winh kajal t'a Roma tzin k'anb'at in b'a. Anhej ta' syal in ch'olb'itaji. Ina ojtak, malaj in mul ix och t'a heb' israel tik.

Tato ay junok in mul smoj in cham yuj jun, in chamokab'i. Palta tato malaj in mul scheclaj yuj heb' israel tik, malaj junok mach syal in yak'anoch t'a yol sk'ab' heb'. Tik tzin k'anb'at in b'ha t'a winh kajal t'a Roma. Ato winh ol in ch'olb'itanoc, xchi winh.

Axo winhaj Festo chi' ix lolon winh yet' heb' tz'ak'an spensaril. Ixlajwi chi' ix yalan winh t'a winhaj Pablo chi': --Ha ach tik ix a k'anb'at a b'ha t'a winh kajal t'a Roma. Yuj chi' ata' ol ach wak'b'ati, xchi winh.
Ayxom sjayiloc k'ual, ichato chi' ix ja winhaj rey Agripa yet' ix Berenice t'a Cesarea chi', yic tzul sk'uman winhaj Festo chi' heb', yujto toto ix och winh t'a yopisio.

Ix ek' jaye' k'ual heb' ta'. Ay jun k'u ix yal winhaj Festo chi' t'a winh rey chi' tas yaj winhaj Pablo chi'. Ix yalan winh icha tik: --Ayic ix el winhaj Félix t'a yopisio ay jun winh scuch Pablo ix kan t'a preso yuj winh.

Ayic ix in xid'ek' t'a Jerusalén, a heb' sat sacerdote yet' heb' ichamtac winak ay yopisio ix k'och heb' t'ayin, ix yak'anoch heb' t'a yib'anh winhaj Pablo chi'. Snib'ej heb' ix wak'och chamel t'a yib'anh winh.

Yuj chi' ix wal icha tik t'a heb': Ha yaj ley t'ayonh aj Roma onh tik, max yal scomon ak'jioch chamel t'a yib'anh junok anima. Yowalil syil-lajoch sat yet' heb' tz'ak'anoch t'a yib'anh chi' t'a yichanh winh juez yic syak'lej yik'anel t'a yib'anh, xin chi t'a heb' aj Jerusalén chi'.
Yuj chi' haxo ix ja heb' t'a tik maj wik'ek' tiempo. Ha t'a junxo k'u ix in och t'a in despacho b'aj sb'o yaj owal. Ix in chekan ik'joccot winhaj Pablo chi'.
Ha in naani to ay wal smul winh. Palta haxo heb' ix ak'anoch t'a yib'anh winh chi', malaj wal smul winh ix yak'och heb' t'a yib'anh icha ix wutej in naani.
Anhej ix yal heb' to ay smul winh t'a sk'ayb'ub'al heb'. Ix yalan heb' yuj jun winh chamnacxo scuch Jesús. Axo yujto syal winhaj Pablo chi' to pitzan winh, yuj chi' syak'och heb' t'a yib'anh winh.

Ha in xo tik max nachaj wuuj tas swutej in b'oan yaj t'a heb'. Yuj chi' ix in k'anb'ej icha tik t'a winhaj Pablo chi': ¿Tzam yal a k'ool tzach b'at t'a Jerusalén yic wach' ata' tzach in ch'olb'itej? xin chi t'a winh.

Palta haxo ix yalan winh t'ayin: Tik tzin k'anb'at in b'ha t'a winh kajal t'a Roma. Ato winh ol in ch'olb'itanoc, xchi winh t'ayin. Yuj chi' a inxo ix wala' to skan winh t'a preso, masanto ol wak'b'at winh t'a winh kajal chi', xchi winhaj Festo chi'.

Ixlajwi yab'an juntzanh chi' winhaj rey Agripa chi', ix yalan winh t'a winhaj Festo chi': --Ha inxo tik, in gana swab' tas syal winhaj Pablo chi', xchi winh. Ix yalan winhaj Festo chi' t'a winh: --Tato icha chi', k'ik'anto tzab' tas syal winh, xchi winh t'a winh.

Axo t'a junxo k'u, ix k'och winhaj rey Agripa yet' ix Berenice chi'. Yelxo wal te wach' yilji heb' yet' spichul, ix och heb' b'aj sb'o yaj owal. Ix och pax heb' yajal soldado yet' heb' ichamtac winak t'a jun chonhab' chi'. Axo winhaj Festo chi' ix chekan ik'joccot winhaj Pablo chi'.

Ixlajwi chi', ix yalan winh icha tik: --Ach Rey Agripa yet' he masanil ix he molb'ej he b'a tik qued'oc, ina winhaj Pablo tik. Masanil heb' israel ix alan t'ayin to ay smul winh. Ix yal heb' t'ayin t'a Jerusalén, ix yalanpax heb' t'ayin t'a Cesarea tik to manhxo smojoc pitzan winh.

Palta tzin na a in tik to malaj junok smul winh, yic smoj scham winh yuj. Toxo ix sk'anb'at sb'a winh t'a winh kajal Augusto, yic wach' a winh ol ch'olb'itan winh. Yuj chi' tzin na'a to ol wak'b'at winh.

Palta malaj tas wach' tzin tz'ib'ejb'at t'a winh kajal chi' yuj winh. Yuj chi' ix wik'cot winh t'a ichanh ach rey Agripa yet' t'a eyichanh he masanil. Ha ticnaik, k'anb'ejec eyab' t'a winh, ta icha chi' ay junok smul winh tz'ilchaj eyuuj, yic a jun chi' ol in tz'ib'ejb'at t'a winh kajalil chi'.
¿Tom ol yal wak'anb'at junok presowum tato max in tz'ib'ejb'at smul tz'och t'a yib'anh? xchi winhaj Festo chi'.
